|brand = Check Point |model = U-5 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Celeron;M (LE80535);LE80535VC600512 (SL8FN); |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = x86 |cpu1spd = 600 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SST;SST49LF008A; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SO-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Elpida;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Intel;82562;EP82562ET |eth2chip = Intel;82574L;WG82574L; |eth3chip = Intel;82574L;WG82574L; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:90:0B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = BIOS;686AMABIOS;CheckPoint Software Technologies LTD Rev:U-5-1.2; |stockos = Linux;2.6.18-92cp;;
|exp_if_types = SATA, Mini PCI, USB 1.1, CompactFlash |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console,, (9600 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = metal case, heat sink |addchip = I/O Controller;Intel;82801FBM;;1;,,, LPC I/O Controller;Winbond;W83627THG;;1;,,, Graphics and Memory Controller;Intel;82910GMLE;;1;,,, 8K SPI Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT25080A;;4;,,, 1K 3-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT93C46D;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;2;,,, Programmable Timing Control Hub;Renesas;ICS954201BGLF;;1;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;2;,,, 3A, 18V,<!--340KHz--> Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1484EN;;3;,,, Hex Inverting Schmitt Trigger w/ 5V Tolerant Input;NXP;74LVC14AD;;1;,,, 10A, 30V N-Channel PWM Optimized MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS4410;;3;,,, 2A, 20V PNP Medium Power Transistor;Nexperia;BCP69;;4;,,, 3A Source/Sink DDR terminator Regulator;TI;TPS51100;;1;,,, 6A, 21V, 600kHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8666DN;;2;,,, Low Voltage Quad Buffer;Fairchild;SN74LCX125;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;,,, Low Skew Output Buffer;ICS;ICS9112-16;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = Lanner |manuf_model = MB-7520 |manuf_rev = V1.0 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = End of Life |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2009 |estprice = 3500 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Celeron]] M @600MHz :LE80535VC600512 ([https://www.cpu-world.com/sspec/SL/SL8FN.html SL8FN]) *Storage: 1MB BIOS Flash, :160GB WD SATA Disk, CompactFlash *Memory: 1GB (DDR2) SODIMM RAM *Network: 4x GbE, 1x FE ports *USB: 2x USB 1.1 ports *PCI: 1x Mini PCI slot *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== :[https://downloads.checkpoint.com/fileserver/SOURCE/direct/ID/10947/FILE/CP_UTM-1_GettingStartedGuide.pdf Getting Started Guide]
